Class Sys

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.links.ressys.Sys

  • public class Sys
extends java.lang.Object
    Sys Class contains ArrayList useful for the purposes of booking.

      • createRoom

        public void createRoom(int maxGuests,
                       java.lang.String[] services)
        * This method creates a new room after checking the validity of its fields. If there are no errors, adds the room to the roomList and inserts it into the database
        Parameters:
        maxGuests - an int variable that indicates the maximum number of guests
        services - a String array that contains the services of a room

      • createCustomer

        public void createCustomer(java.lang.String taxCode,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String surname,
                           java.lang.String cellPhoneNumber,
                           java.lang.String mailAddress,
                           java.lang.String cardNumber)
        This method creates a new customer after checking the validity of its fields. If there are no errors, adds the customer to the customerList and inserts it into the database
        Parameters:
        taxCode - a string that contains the tax code of customer
        name - a String that contains the name of customer
        surname - a String that contains the surname of customer
        cellPhoneNumber - a String that contains the phone number of customer
        mailAddress - a String that contains the email of customer
        cardNumber - a String that contains the card number of customer

      • createReservation

        public void createReservation(java.lang.String mailAddress,
                              int[] roomIds,
                              java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                              java.time.LocalDate endDate)
        This method creates a new reservation after checking the existence of the customer's mail and room ID. If the mail and room ID already exists assign the same to reservation
        Parameters:
        mailAddress - a string contains the mail of customer.
        roomIds - an array of int that contains the ID of rooms
        startDate - a local date that specifies the beginning of the reservation
        endDate - a local date that specifies the end of the reservation
